name: Shannon/desktop 模块
description: [模块级] Shannon 项目的 desktop 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/Kocoro-lab/Shannon

genes.title: desktop 模块说明
genes.content:
Download pre-built desktop applications from [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/Kocoro-lab/Shannon/releases/latest):

- **[macOS (Universal)](https://github.com/Kocoro-lab/Shannon/releases/latest)** — Intel & Apple Silicon
- **[Windows (x64)](https://github.com/Kocoro-lab/Shannon/releases/latest)** — MSI or EXE installer
- **[Linux (x64)](https://github.com/Kocoro-lab/Shannon/releases/latest)** — AppImage or DEB package

Or build from source:

```bash
cd desktop
npm install
npm run tauri:build

genes.title: desktop 文件结构
genes.content:
desktop/.env.local.example
desktop/.gitignore
desktop/README.md
desktop/app
desktop/app/(app)
desktop/app/(app)/agents
desktop/app/(app)/agents/page.tsx
desktop/app/(app)/layout.tsx

desktop/app/(app)/run-detail/page.tsx
desktop/app/(app)/runs
desktop/app/(app)/runs/page.tsx
desktop/app/(app)/schedules
desktop/app/(app)/schedules/page.tsx
desktop/app/(app)/settings

genes.title: desktop 代码示例
genes.content:
cd desktop
npm install
npm run tauri:build  # Builds for your platform
